column2: The Total/Estimates Data File (yyempest.dat for sample years; yyemptot.dat for Census years) is comprised of 84-character data records. All payroll and part-time hours in the data file are 31-day monthly equivalent values for the month of March.

column1: State code (states & DC in alpha sequence where '00' denotes United States)

Type of summary total code

0 = US Total
1 = state and local total
2 = state only total
3 = local only total
5 = county only total
6 = municipality only total
7 = township only total
8 = special district only total
9 = school district only total
